name: Nick Bell
bio: I have been developing in JS for 6 years. We use JS heavily at GOFan, and I am excited to be a mentor.

name: Ryan Boris
bio: I have written JavaScript as part of various JS frameworks, open source projects, and profesionally.  As a MEAN stack developer, JS is my life.  I would identify JS as the language I am most comfortable with at an advanced level.  I also teach JS lessons in webinars from time to time. Please feel free to ask me any questions!
